content:
Hi everyone,

I have been working towards developing a product, and investigating wasm/wasi was a significant part of my journey over the past year and a half.

I have reached the end of my runway and am trying to find an opportunity where I can work with wasmtime/wasi-cloud-core and Rust so I can stay sharp on the technology I want to use until I can continue my journey.

If anyone knows of any opportunites that may align with this goal, please let me know so I can throw my hat in the ring.

Thank you!
Stephen

actually, we have some entry level positions available in central EU; whether that applies to you or not, we've received LOTS of questions about posting opportunities, so while we figure out where to post and how, definitely drop in your openings here....
